headline: Piper Sandler Sees Long-Term Upside in KKR & Co. Inc. (KKR) Despite Short-Term Headwinds
summary: Coatue Management holds $499.53 million worth of shares in KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR), representing 1.39% of its total 13F portfolio, helping the stock secure a place on our list of billionaire Philippe Laffont’s 10 stock picks with huge upside potential. On October 7, 2025, Piper Sandler reduced its price target on KKR & Co. […]

headline: How KKR's (KKR) Launch of Galaxy Container Solutions Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Earlier this week, KKR announced the launch of Galaxy Container Solutions, a global container leasing and financing platform backed by US$500 million from KKR-managed credit funds under its Asset-Based Finance (ABF) strategy. This expansion leverages KKR's multi-sector ABF approach and brings an experienced leadership team to address growing demand for flexible shipping container solutions worldwide. Let's explore how KKR's substantial ABF investment and entry into container leasing shapes...
